Their letters

Candace Shekinah Africa

Candace Shekinah Africa was incarcerated in 1996 for two counts of murder and arson. She is serving two life sentences at MCI - Norfolk.

Click to see her story.

Katheena Nevia Soneeya

Katheena Nevia Soneeya was convicted of the murders of her cousin and another woman in 1982. She has been serving a life sentence at MCI - Shirley ever since.

Michelle Lynne Kosilek

Michelle Lynne Kosilek has been serving a life sentence at MCI - Norfolk for over 25 years. She was convicted of murdering her wife, Cheryl McCaul, in 1990.
